Title: Dragonlord
Intro: A Dragonlord is armed with one of the following weapon options: Dragon Blade and Enchanted Shield; Dragon Lance and Enchanted Shield; Dragon Blade and Reaver Bow; Dragon Lance and Reaver Bow; Dragon Blade and Aelven War Horn; or Dragon Lance and Aelven War Horn.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Dragon is armed with Claws and Fearsome Jaws.

Rules.Name: Dragon Lance
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES If this unit is armed with a Dragon Lance and it makes a charge move, until the end of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with its Dragon Lance and add 1 to the damage inflicted by each successful attack made with its Dragon Lance.

Rules.Name: Enchanted Shield
Rules.Rule: If this unit is armed with an Enchanted Shield, you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit.

Rules.Name: Aelven War Horn
Rules.Rule: If this unit is armed with an Aelven War Horn, once per battle, in the combat phase, you can say that it will sound the attack. If you do so, until the end of that phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly ORDER DRACONIS units while they are within 10" of this unit. A unit cannot be affected by this ability more than once per phase.

Rules.Name: Dragonfire
Rules.Rule: In your shooting phase, this unit’s Dragon can unleash a blast of dragonfire. When it does so, pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of this unit and visible to it, and roll a dice. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

Rules.Name: Lord Of Dragons
Rules.Rule: Lord of Dragons: Once per battle, in the combat phase, you can say that this unit will inspire members of its order. If you do so, pick all friendly ORDER DRACONIS units within 10" of this unit. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by those units until the end of that phase.
